thread.title: Search after man falls from cliff at Arbroath
thread.title_full: Search after man falls from cliff at Arbroath

title: Search after man falls from cliff at Arbroath
text:
Search after man falls from cliff at Arbroath 25 February 2017 Read more about sharing. Close share panel A major search is under way for a man believed to have fallen from cliffs at Arbroath in Angus. 
Police Scotland said the emergency services were alerted to the incident at about 13:00. 
A coastguard helicopter and lifeboat joined rescue teams looking for the man. 
A post on the RNLI Montrose Lifeboat Facebook page said it had been stood down at 18:20 "due to failing light".
